title: How can I add a menu to an executable file that does not have one?
content:
I am just reverse-engineering an application I made for fun but since it doesn't have a menu. How can I add one?
I tried using IDA pro but no hope, same with OllyDbg.

answers_data.content:
If exe supports plugins or uses dll - you can

use plugin functionality
or make proxy-dll with required functionality.

or, find a free space in the executable and write a patch that adds a
menu to your application.
useful WinAPI functions:
CreateMenu, AppendMenu, InsertMenuItem
to Author,
here we discuss reverse engineering, not programming or hacking

comments.text: Can you write down the code for the patch. Thanks!
